Package org.webpki.cbor

Class CBORSymKeyEncrypter

java.lang.Object
org.webpki.cbor.CBOREncrypter
org.webpki.cbor.CBORSymKeyEncrypter
public class CBORSymKeyEncrypter extends CBOREncrypter
Class for creating CBOR symmetric key encryptions. It uses COSE algorithms but relies on CEF for the packaging. Note that encrypters may be used any number of times (assuming that the same parameters are valid). They are also thread-safe.
